com.turvo.abcbanking.repository

Interface ServiceStepRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseRepository<ServiceStep,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ServiceStep,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ServiceStep,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface ServiceStepRepository
extends BaseRepository<ServiceStep,java.lang.Long>
    Standard repository class for Service Step operations
    Author:
    Prabal Ghura

      • findByServiceId

        @Query(value="select step from ServiceXServiceStep sxs, ServiceStep step where sxs.stepId=step.id and sxs.serviceId=?1 order by sxs.order")
